sources.title: Stone of Destiny | FULL MOVIE | Charlie Cox, Kate Mara | Adventure, Comedy
sources.description:
Based on the true story, Ian Hamilton (Charlie Cox) and his friends (Kate Mara, Billy Boyd) make a daring raid on Westminster Abbey in an attempt to return the historic Stone of Destiny back to its rightful place.

Charlie Cox, Kate Mara, Robert Carlyle, Billy Boyd, Peter Mullan, Brenda Fricker, Stephen McCole, Ciaron Kelly, Ian Hamilton, Ron Donachie

2008

Directed by Charles Martin Smith

metadata.Plot: The Stone of Destiny retells the fascinating and true story of four young Glaswegian students who, in 1951, outwitted the British authorities in their successful attempt to take back the Stone of Scone - a beloved symbol of Scottish pride, back to its country of origin.
metadata.Actors: Charlie Cox, Kate Mara, Stephen McCole
